LocalFileStore_saveFile.name: LocalFileStore_saveFile
LocalFileStore_saveFile.description: Saves the contents to a file with the given filename and updates metadata.

parameters.name: filename
parameters.description: The name of the file to save.

parameters.name: contents
parameters.description: The contents to save to the file.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: A description of the contents which can be used to identify it later.

LocalFileStore_getFile.name: LocalFileStore_getFile
LocalFileStore_getFile.description: Retrieves the contents of a file.

parameters.name: filename
parameters.description: The name of the file to read.
